headline: Kimberly-Clark (KMB) Target Lowered by Evercore ISI, Entry Point Highlighted
summary: Kimberly-Clark Corporation (NYSE:KMB) ranks among the stocks with low beta that can beat market volatility. On September 22, Evercore ISI maintained its Outperform rating on Kimberly-Clark Corporation (NYSE:KMB), but cut its price target from $155 to $150. Citing effects from pantry loading and marketing delays in North America, the firm lowered its third-quarter sales projections […]
